questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Urban architecture
D) Wildlife and animals

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) Inside a museum
D) In an urban area

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A cityscape at sunset/sunrise
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) A tall building
C) A busy street
D) A beach

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A forest
B) A body and building, trees around it
C) A tall building reflecting sunlight
D) A group of people

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) More buildings and the horizon
C) A beach
D) A forest

A) A bridge over a river
B) A playground
C) A sandy beach
D) A busy street

B) Ocean
C) River
D) Mountains

A) A lighthouse
B) A bridge and buildings
C) A windmill
D) A stadium

A) Trees
B) Buildings
C) Boats
D) People

B) Green
C) Orange/Golden
D) Red

B) Boats
C) Swimmers
D) Fish

C) Snowy
D) Foggy

A) A mountain
B) A skyscraper
C) A tree
D) A tower
